Dialog Design

Practice implementing and styling a modal using the <dialog> tag.

  1. Click the 'Open Dialog' button to show the modal.
  2. Use CSS to change the width and border of the modal. Hint: The dialog selector can be used.
  3. Add an <h2> and <p> to the modal.
  4. Use CSS and the ::backdrop pseudo-element to add a backdrop behind the modal.
  5. Add a <form> with a method of dialog to the dialog. Within the <form> add a <button>. This will allow the user to close the modal.
  6. Add additional style to the modal and button.
